name: Cubecore
description:
Test your reflexes in this fast-paced rhythm game! Match the right side of the cube with the incoming note colors! Can you reach the highest score?

Controls:
W / Up Arrow - Move Up
S / Down Arrow - Move Down
E / D / Right Arrow - Rotate Clockwise
Q / A  / Left Arrow - Rotate Counterclockwise
R - Restart

Cubecore was created by Daniel HCC for GeoJam 2022.

Daniel HCC - Coding, Art, Game Design
Caio Cesar - Music

Asset packs:
- DOTween - Demigiant
